name: Fizz (Game Jam Version)
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME IS INCOMPLETE. THE AUTHOR LIST AND THIS DESCRIPTION IS TO BE UPDATED. PLEASE EXPECT A LINK HERE TO THE COMPLETE GAME ONCE IT IS FINISHED.

In Fizz, you must explore different stages and grab samples of different elements. By combining your newly found elements, you create new elements that can be used to help you explore the map.

Controls:
Space Bar - Start game
Left Arrow - Move left
Right Arrow - Move right
Z - Jump
X - Cycle through inventory items: left
C - Cycle through inventory items: right
D - Get sample
F - Use currently selected item

GitHub Repository: https://github.com/ClarCromp/fizz-game
